E

EatingAction - Class in game
A class which represents an action to eat food.
EatingAction(Item) - Constructor for class game.EatingAction
Constructor.
EatingBehaviour - Class in game
A class that generates an EatingBehaviour if the current Actor who has less than half of his hit point, is standing in a location which has a food.
EatingBehaviour() - Constructor for class game.EatingBehaviour
 
endGameMessage() - Method in class game.ZombieWorld

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.ChantingAction
The actor (Mambo Marie) will chant and create 5 new Zombies at random locations of the map the actor is currently on.
execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.CraftWeaponAction
Remove the item from the actor inventory and craft the item into different weapon based on its capability and add the weapon back into actor inventory.
execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.EatingAction
If player eats the food, remove the food from the player inventory and add heal points to player.

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.SnippingAction
